00020 
00021 UISearchWidget::UISearchWidget(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager, QWidget* parent) : 
00022     QWidget(parent),
00023     m_translation_manager(translation_manager),
00024     m_search_button(new QPushButton(tr("Search"))),
00025     m_search_input_field(new QLineEdit()),
00026     m_translation_selection_row(new QHBoxLayout),
00027     m_match_case_checkbox(new QCheckBox(tr("Match case"))),
00028     m_match_whole_word_checkbox(new QCheckBox(tr("Whole words")))
00029 {
00030     QT_CONNECT(m_search_button, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(perform_search()));
00031     QT_CONNECT(m_search_input_field, SIGNAL(returnPressed()), this, SLOT(perform_search()));
00032 
00033     m_match_case_checkbox->setChecked(true);
00034     m_match_whole_word_checkbox->setChecked(false);
00035 
00036     QVBoxLayout* search_options = new QVBoxLayout;
00037     search_options->addWidget(m_match_case_checkbox);
00038     search_options->addWidget(m_match_whole_word_checkbox);
00039 
00040     QHBoxLayout* search_field_row = new QHBoxLayout;
00041     search_field_row->addWidget(m_search_input_field);
00042     search_field_row->addWidget(m_search_button);
00043     search_field_row->addLayout(search_options);
00044 
00045     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00046 
00047     layout->addLayout(search_field_row);
00048     layout->addLayout(m_translation_selection_row);
00049     setLayout(layout);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void UISearchWidget::display_translation_check_boxes()
00053 {
00054     for (TranslationIterator it = m_translation_manager->begin(); it != m_translation_manager->end(); ++it)
00055     {
00056         this->add_translation_check_box(*it);
00057     }
00058  
00059     m_translation_selection_row->addStretch(1);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void UISearchWidget::perform_search()
00063 {
00064     if (!m_search_input_field->text().isEmpty())
00065     {
00066         emit search_started(m_search_input_field->text());
00067 
00068         std::vector<std::string> selected_translations;
00069 
00070         for (std::vector<QCheckBox*>::const_iterator it = m_translation_checkboxes.begin(); it != m_translation_checkboxes.end(); ++it)
00071         {
00072             if ((*it)->isChecked())
00073             {
00074                 selected_translations.push_back((*it)->text().toStdString());
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         int search_option = CaseSensitive;
00079         if (m_match_case_checkbox->checkState() == Qt::Unchecked)
00080         {
00081             search_option = CaseInsensitive;
00082         }
00083 
00084         if (m_match_whole_word_checkbox->checkState() == Qt::Checked)
00085         {
00086             search_option |= MatchWholeWord;
00087         }
00088 
00089         m_command_perform_search = boost::shared_ptr<ICommand>(new CommandPerformSearch(m_translation_manager, selected_translations, m_search_input_field->text().toStdString(), search_option));
00090         m_search_worker = boost::make_shared<BackgroundWorker>(m_command_perform_search);
00091 
00092         QT_CONNECT(m_search_worker.get(), SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(search_worker_finished()));
00093         
00094         m_search_worker->start();
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void UISearchWidget::search_worker_finished()
00099 {
00100     QT_DISCONNECT(m_search_worker.get(), SIGNAL(finished()), this, SLOT(search_worker_finished()));
00101 
00102     boost::shared_ptr<CommandPerformSearch> command_perform_search = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<CommandPerformSearch>(m_command_perform_search);
00103     emit search_complete(command_perform_search->get_results());
00104 }
00105 
00106 void UISearchWidget::add_translation_check_box(boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00107 {
00108     QCheckBox* translation_check_box = new QCheckBox(translation->get_short_name().c_str());
00109     translation_check_box->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00110     m_translation_selection_row->addWidget(translation_check_box);
00111     m_translation_checkboxes.push_back(translation_check_box);
00112 }
